page.title: 15 A Day in the life of...
page.content:
I awoke to my clock radio at 7.30.I hit the snooze button for 9 minutes. I then get up and go downstairs and turn on {Breakfast TV}and walk into the kitchen to eat peanut butter on toast. I put on my {school uniform}.I leave the TV and go to school.
At school we start with assembly, first lesson(70mins) then break. At break we chat about computer games which I find boring. I go home for soup at dinner. In the afternoon there are 2 more 70 min lessons. I go home and immeadiately switch on the {TV}and watch till around 7pm. We have our tea off trays in front of the{TV.
My friends call and we{play pool}on my table. I then do my homework in bed listening to Piccadilly radio. Robert Mortimer 15
